release.action: Fixed a bug causing incorrect behavior in PlaceMembersOnAxes transform when axes are swapped.
Level members are now added to their respective parent hierarchies.
Fixed a bug causing incorrect level order in PlaceLevelsOnAxes.findVisibleLevels method.
Built-in drill down and sorting support in PivotRenderer(command API).
Major refactoring on the UI related API. Replaced the TableBuilder interface with a callback style PivotRenderer interface for flexibility.
Fixed a bug which made config parameters to be ignored in PooledOlapDataSource class.
Remove JDBC 4.0 API dependency to make it compile on Java 6.
Improved query transform API with more convenient methods.
Model state serialization code has been rewritten to fix a problem with PivotModel.restoreState().
Provide an easier way to implement sort headers.
Made TableBuilder API to generate missing level headers on row axis.
Fixed a bug in TableBuilder which generates incorrect table layout for non-contiguous level members.
Added the table builder API to facilliate UI implementation process.
Support for placing members on a non exisiting hierarchy.
Improve handling of an empty query axis.
Finished migration of major JPivot extensions as Transform API.
Added various data source implementations including PooledOlapDataSource.
